1b1: rgya gar skad du/ sha ta sA ha sr-i ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du/ shes rab kya
1b2: rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ dum pa dang po// bam po thog ma'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
1b3: thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya
1b4: rgod 'phungs pa la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig ste/ thams cad kyang
1b5: dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin du rnam par grol ba/
1b6: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas
1b7: pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa
1b8: bka' yang dag pas sems shin du rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la
2a1: pha rol du phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob pa rgyun du zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang /
2a2: ste dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen mad shin du mang ba kun kyang ches mthong ba sha stag dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
2a3: grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa
2a4: chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa/ bstan pa zad mi shes pa la so so yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa
2a5: chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin du ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo med cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshul 'chos pa med
2a6: pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grags pa dang khe dang bkur bsti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/
2a7: yid yongs su zhum pa med pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rol po'i rgol ba
2a8: thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa nas
2b1: smon lam shin du brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog mar smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa
2b2: spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa'i mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstan pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang
2b3: smig rgyu dang chu zla dang rmi lam dang sgra brnyan dang mig yor dang nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang sprul pa dang gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa med pa/ sems can thams cad
2b4: kyi sems kyi rgyud dang shes pa phra ba dang spyod pa dang mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs chen po dang ldan pa/ chos
2b5: thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la dbang shin du thob
2b6: pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa dang lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la bzhugs pa/ lta ba dang bag la/
2b7: nyal ba dang kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba/ kun du sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la
2b8: mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgra brnyan dang 'dra bar rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad med pa la 'jigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/
3a1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon lam gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu
3a2: rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba gdab pa la mkhas pa/ sems can gyi lta ba sna tshogs kyis
3a3: yongs su bskyed pa'i nyon mongs bzhi par bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par sgrub pa la rnam par rtse ba'i ye shes rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas
3a4: par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub/
3a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon chen po dang / byang chub sems
3a6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyes bus byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob sred dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
3a7: chen po dbang pos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pon po'i stobs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
3a8: 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros 'phel ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b1: dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib med blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3b2: po mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
3b3: dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi gtong brtson pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3b4: po zla ba'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros dpe med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
3b5: po mthu chen po thob pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
3b6: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b7: dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
3b8: chen po ri bo'i zo ma dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs gcig tu bzhags
4a1: so/ / de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sru drang por bsrang ste/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas dkyil mo dkrung bcas te bzhugs so// der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin ga
4a2: du ting nge 'dzin thams cad 'dra ba dang khongs su chud pa dang rjes su 'brang ba dang 'dra bar 'gyur bye ti nga 'dzin ti dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag go/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mkhyen
4a3: pas/ ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas dang seng da ba kye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo
4a4: rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang
4a5: 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / zhabs byin pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // zhabs pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
4a6: drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // sku sta zur gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // sku lte ba'i
4a7: dkyil 'khor nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / sku rtsibs logs gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
4a8: dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // phyag lag ngar gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig
4b1: brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // mgur nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag cig tu stong drug cu drug bcu byung ngo // tshems mche ba bzhi las
4b2: kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / tshems bzhi bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // spyan gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya sto
4b3: drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo / / snyan gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung ngo // shangs kyi sbubs gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu drug bcu byung
4b4: ngo/ / smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu byung ngo // steng gi spyi gtsug nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu byung ngo // zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer
4b5: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug bcu po de dag thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad sdang ba chen pos khya
4b6: par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab
4b7: par byas so/ / nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
4b8: byas so/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
5a1: b+he ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs mtsham
5a2: su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi
5a3: phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa/
5a4: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
5a5: khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
5a6: snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
5a7: ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams
5a8: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams/
5b1: su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs
5b2: su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ / sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
5b3: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad
5b4: do/ / shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub
5b5: phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang shar gyi
5b6: phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
5b7: mdzad do/ / lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang
5b8: ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ / 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen
6a1: pos khyab par mdzad do/ / sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bco
6a2: ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// ljags kyi dbang
6a3: pobo de las kyang 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon to/ / 'od zer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba/ mdab
6a4: ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/ dri zhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin ti ka ltar re ga na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur
6a5: te/ pad mo de dag lade bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig
6a6: rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten
6a7: gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kham
6a8: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
6b1: klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
6b2: krung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gAng
6b3: klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
6b4: gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
6b5: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
6b6: klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye
6b7: ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol du phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med
6b8: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par
7a1: gzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi kham pa 'dzinam pa drug tu g.yos te/ gsas ma/ rab rdzags
7a2: so/ / kun du g.yos so// 'gul to// rab tu 'gul to// kun du 'gul to// ldeg go// rab tu ldeg go// kun du ldeg go/ che mtsham/ rab tu chemachem/ kun du che mchem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu'ur 'ur/ kun du
7a3: 'ura'ur ro/ / shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun du shig shig go/ mtha' mthon ni dbus dma'/ dbus mthon ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus pags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la/
7a4: pan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i
7a5: 'jig rten dang mi khom pa dang ngan song dang ngan 'gro dang log par lhung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rkun chad par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang me la skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// rgyal/
7a6: chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang sum bcu rtsa gsum dang mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang mi de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang
7a7: nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi na bsal/
7a8: phyag 'tshal bar gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams
7b1: cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba
7b2: dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de
7b3: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
7b4: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba
7b5: thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam/
7b6: par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa
7b7: de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du ngong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin
7b8: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
8a1: gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag
8a2: thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de dag nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dka' ba dang mos pa dang
8a3: nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing byin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal
8a4: te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
8a5: klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad
8a6: kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde/
8a7: ba thob par gyur pa/ de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung dra dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
8a8: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thad cig la/ byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
8b1: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gake de'i 'jig rten gyi lasas thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams/
8b2: cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams
8b3: bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/
8b4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
8b5: khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems
8b6: can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas
8b7: kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi
8b8: drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud
9a1: tsam thang cag la/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i
9a2: 'jig rten gyi mas thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos
9a3: pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin
9a4: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
9a5: sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur te/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams
9a6: cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes
9a7: so/ / de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag
9a8: rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs
9b1: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ / de nas de'i tshe'i skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye
9b2: ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams
9b3: cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang mos pa dang
9b4: nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag
9b5: 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
9b6: khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems
9b7: can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so/ / de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga'
9b8: ba dang mos pa dang nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin
10a1: nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
10a2: rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// smon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur
10a3: to/ / sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa med pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur
10a4: to/ / skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngal ba rnams kyang
10a5: ngal sos par gyur to/ / lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad
10a6: kyang sems can thams cad la dper na/ pha dang ma dang phu nu dang sring mo dang mdza' bo dang gnyen pa dang grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba
10a7: bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing / tshangs par spyod pa dang gtsang ba dang nyes pa'i dri nga ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan
10a8: par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa 'di lta bu'i shes rab dang ldan par
10b1: gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// dul ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// dben pa ni dge ba'o// bag byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge ba'o// snying rje ni dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad
10b2: la mi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to/ / de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa/ nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su
10b3: dag pa la 'dug pa'am/ zla ba nya'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang
10b4: bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid
10b5: dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang
10b6: dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal
10b7: gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis
10b8: mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing
11a1: lham me/ lhan ne// lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes//
11a2: shing lham me/ wAn ne// lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis gnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis
11a3: mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal
11a4: gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis/
11a5: mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis
11a6: mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang der bzhugs so// de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes
11a7: shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham/
11a8: me/ ldan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// 'di lta ste dper na ri'i rgyal po re rab ni rin po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lgang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i
11b1: gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me// ldan ne/
11b2: lhang de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa dang gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa zil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang sra
11b3: mdog dang gzi brjid dang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang de'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin
11b4: gyi sku ci 'dra ba de bzhin du bstan to/ / de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang kun snang dang ba dang tshangs ris dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang 'phrul dga' dang
11b5: dga' ldan dang mtshe ma dang sum bcu rtsa gsum dang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i
11b6: khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la/ nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang lha rdzas kyi phreng ba dang lha rdzas kyi spos dang lha rdzas kyi byug pa
11b7: dang / lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang lha rdzas kyi ud pa la dang pad mo dang ku mo da dang pun da ri ka dang na li na dang so'u gan d+hi dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ge sa ra dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang lha rdzas kyi na
11b8: bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang phreng ba dang spos dang byug
12a1: pa dang phye ma dang byug spos dang / ud pa la dang / pang mo dang ku mu da dang bun da ri ka dang na li na dang so'u gan d+hi dang me tog ge sa ra dang ta ma la'i lo ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal
12a2: mtshan dang lha'i ba dan dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ / mngon par gtor to// rab tu gtor to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ 'dul ba dang snod du gyur pa'i mi
12a3: ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang thad las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang
12a4: phreng ba dang spos dang byug pa dang phye ma la sogs pa dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba ngan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan
12a5: 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du red gnas par gyur to/ / khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me
12a6: tog dang dar gyi lda ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/ / mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to// me tog dang ngar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shin du mdzes
12a7: bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gyi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin du mdzes shing lha ma me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du
12a8: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom
12b1: ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi
12b2: 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom
12b3: ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to//
12b4: lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
12b5: gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab/
12b6: cing gsal bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin
12b7: gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar
12b8: sems pa de bzhin du nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
13a1: shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
13a2: bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
13a3: pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin
13a4: gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur
13a5: te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
13a6: de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de
13a7: bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/
13a8: bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par
13b1: gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par
13b2: gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
13b3: par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du
13b4: sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du
13b5: sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
13b6: par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung snang gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems
13b7: par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam
13b8: du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas
14a1: 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi
14a2: shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung dge'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog
14a3: mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas
14a4: cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog
14a5: mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi
14a6: shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// chung che'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi
14a7: shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas
14a8: cho ga mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta
14b1: bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta
14b2: bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
14b3: sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin
14b4: gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de
14b5: bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis
14b6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// de bzhin du stong gi 'jig/
14b7: rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na
14b8: bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ / stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur
15a1: te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis de bzhin
15a2: gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
15a3: gdan seng ge'i khro de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
15a4: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
15a5: kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
15a6: rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye
15a7: ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi phyi
15a8: ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to/ / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems
15b1: c an gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
15b2: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa meng po mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
15b3: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa med pa mthong bar gyur
15b4: to/ / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
15b5: pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bces pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin
15b6: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar
15b7: gyur to/ / byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
15b8: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa med po mthong bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
16a1: ga nga gi snyam skad kying bzhan gshegs pa daklub kyib pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyanakyis ga/ dud dadu muhA/
16a2: sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// lha nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
16a3: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang btsas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to// nub
16a4: b yang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas
16a5: paM/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur / 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ba snyed kyi bani
16a6: gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas patu rgyu mas pa 'ang dzums pa pa ma / gaphyogs dzin
16a7: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang
16a8: bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur to/ / shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed
16b1: 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs
16b2: rgyas kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi
16b3: 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
16b4: ' di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa
16b5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ / nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dgu na
16b6: sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
16b7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong
16b8: bar gyur to/ / byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag na/ sems can ga ji snyed pa 'ayod pa de dag gis
16'a1: klung stong gsum gyi snod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dren/ com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgA bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'asangs rgya
16'a2: shA thub pa dge slong ga dge 'dun dang btsas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar g+hA to// byang shang kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jug rten gyi khams ga 'i klung gi skyes te
16'a3: po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
16'a4: shAkyathub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de
16'a5: dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
16'a6: thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// snron pa kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi byes snyed po de dag na/
16'a7: mas can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'drin/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas thub pa /
16'a8: slosrong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// rlu byang gi phyogs 'jams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i kla ga byem snyed par dadagan/ sems
16'b1: can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong
16'b2: gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed
16'b3: 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
16'b4: dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod
16'b5: pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
16'b6: dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// de nas shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/
16'b7: 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas shes byangang bzhugs shing 'tsho sbyor ste/ de byang
16'b8: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer
17a1: kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta ma chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
17a2: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
17a3: 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen
17a4: de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer
17a5: kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/
17a6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyod do// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du
17a7: byin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
17a8: pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
17b1: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par
17b2: rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis
17b3: bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
17b4: 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das
17b5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
17b6: 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas
17b7: 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/
17b8: byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs
18a1: r gyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dngan bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang
18a2: rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur bstir bya ba dang phu dung du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom
18a3: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs/
18a4: gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18a5: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde/
18a6: ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
18a7: 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/
18a8: shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gis
18b1: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston
18b2: to/ / chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
18b3: khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
18b4: rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ / bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod par byas so// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa/
18b5: de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang //
18b6: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
18b7: ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
18b8: sku blta chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
19a1: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang dogs 'di//
19a2: ltang cher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
19a3: mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
19a4: 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong do// de byang chub sems
19a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
19a6: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
19a7: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa gzungs
19a8: dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin der goms par 'jug pa de dag thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i
19b1: dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i
19b2: dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
19b3: ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sem
19b4: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
19b5: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs
19b6: su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas// lho phyogs logs su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad
19b7: la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur bster bya ba dang phu dud du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/
19b8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba dar dong ste
20a1: phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pas/
20a2: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal kyi/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod
20a3: pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
20a4: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
20a5: pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
20a6: gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug
20a7: po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to/ / chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems
20a8: dpa' chen po khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
20b1: shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ / bkur bstir byas so// pu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten
20b2: gyi khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems
20b3: dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros shes bya ba 'dug 'dug
20b4: pas/ snang ba chen po de dngas cher g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
20b5: chen 'od 'phro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od
20b6: chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
20b7: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar
20b8: phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
21a1: sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ngo ro/ / de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o//
21a2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces
21a3: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang de la
21a4: phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang /
21a5: snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chen do thos ga 'gyul ba/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes
21a6: na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i
21a7: blo gros la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog can stong skur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub
21a8: pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
21b1: mgu bar bka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
21b2: pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de las/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bya
21b3: ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang /
21b4: spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur bstir bya ba dang phu rud du bya ba dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub
21b5: sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste
21b6: byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis
21b7: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod
21b8: pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
22a1: gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'bros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du sbyar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
22a2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
22a3: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs
22a4: shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
22a5: nges par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de
22a6: bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ / bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas byang phyogs logs
22a7: su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
22a8: rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig
22b1: rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong
22b2: nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gangan pa der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
22b3: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i
22b4: sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sem
22b5: dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/
22b6: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol du
22b7: phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
22b8: rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
23a1: du sa sa dpa tham dag na / sa
23a2: pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob po de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/
23a3: rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub
23a4: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong sbyar te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
23a5: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi ya mi da deng skyes pa'i byang chub sems
23a6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
23a7: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bya
23a8: mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong
23b1: b a de dag thams cad la me tog dang spos dang bdug spos dang phreng ba dang byug pa dang phye ma dang na bza' dang rgyan dang gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang bkur bstir bya ba dang phu dud du bya ba
23b2: dang mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
23b3: thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
23b4: rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das la snyun/
23b5: mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog can mdab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan
23b6: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du skur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
23b7: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
23b8: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ / de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
24a1: sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med
24a2: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba dang khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge
24a3: ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur bstir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so//
24a4: de nas byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa
24a5: dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol
24a6: du phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ / de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen/
24a7: po de dang sa cher g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang
24a8: po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol
24b1: to/ / bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /
24b2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal
