160a8: spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang chos kyi
160b1: dbyings dang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
160b2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings dang chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba mi byed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
160b3: chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du chos
160b4: kyi dbyings khong du chud par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam khong du chud par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de ni 'di ltar des chos gang gis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag
160b5: par rjes su mthong ba med do/ / de yang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/ mi stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes
160b6: rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa
160b7: nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro/ / tshor ba dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang tshor bar mi sbyor ro// 'du shes dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du shes su mi sbyor ro// 'du byed dang stong pa nyid du/
160b8: mi sbyor// stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du mi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par mi sbyor ro// mig dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig du mi sbyor ro//
161a1: rna ba dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna bar mi sbyor ro// sna dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang snar mi sbyor ro// lce dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lcer mi sbyor ro// lus dang
161a2: stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus su mi sbyor ro// yid dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid du mi sbyor ro// gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro// sku
161a3: dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgrar mi sbyor ro// dri dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang drir mi sbyor ro// ro dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ror mi sbyor ro// reg dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/
161a4: stong pa nyid dang reg tu mi sbyor ro// chos dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos su mi sbyor ro// mig gi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi khams su mi sbyor ro// gzugs kyi
161a5: khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su mi sbyor ro// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su
161a6: mi sbyor ro/ / rna ba'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i khams su mi sbyor ro// sgra'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su mi sbyor ro// rna ba'i rnam
161a7: par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su mi sbyor ro//
161a8: dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang dri'i khams su mi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su
161b1: mi sbyor ro/ / lce'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su mi sbyor ro// ro khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ro'i khams su mi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams/
161b2: dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// lus kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi khams su mi sbyor ro// reg bya dang stong pa nyid du mi
161b3: sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg byar mi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro// yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du ma
161b4: sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su mi sbyor ro// chos kyi khams dang stong ba nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su mi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid
161b5: kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi sbyor ro/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
161b6: stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do// bla na med pa
161b7: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces
161b8: bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa
162a1: dang smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor te/ bla na med pa'i rnal 'byor to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung bstan pa zhes bya ste/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
162a2: byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni// sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don byed kyang / de 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la
162a3: brtson pa yin no zhe 'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar mi sems so// bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung bstan pa mdzad do// bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to// bdag gis ni sangs
162a4: rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyad par bya'o/ / bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya'o// bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo
162a5: bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu 'byed pa med de/ de ni chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'am/ gang la
162a6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung bstan par bya ba 'am/ gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
162a7: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o// bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o// srog gi 'du shes mi skye'o// 'gro ba'i 'du
162a8: shes mi skye'o/ / gso ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o// skyes bu'i 'du shes mi skye'o// gang zag gi 'du shes mi skyo'o// shed can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes mi skye'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o// tshor ba po'i 'dra
162b1: shes mi skye'o/ / shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o// mthong ba po'i 'du shes mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin du skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa'i phyir te/ sems can la ni skye ba dang 'gag pa med do// /
162b2: gang la skye ba dang 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas shes rab
162b3: kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas
162b4: shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can rang bzhin med pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin// sems can ngo bo nyid med pas shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shAr
162b5: dra ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
162b6: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor te/ des de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te gnas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin
162b7: gshegs pa'i stobs bcu mngon par sgrub bo/ / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mngon par
162b8: sgrub po/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems mi skyed do// tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems dang / gnod par sems pa'i sems dang /
163a1: le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi skyed do// de skad ces bka' stsal ba dang / shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
163a2: 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis spyod pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/
163a3: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas/
163a4: shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
163a5: gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la rnal 'byor myur du 'grub pa ste/ tshe rabs 'di 'das nas kyang / chos zab mo 'di dag de la mngon du 'gyur
163a6: ro/ / de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la mnyam par gzhog go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
163a7: bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la
163a8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de ni pha rol du phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo
163b1: dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa med do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas mi dang skal ba mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni/ phyir mi ldog
163b2: pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin no// de la gzungs kyi sgo
163b3: dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang khyod kyis de skad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la
163b4: snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ gang na sangs
163b5: rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ nam yang sangs rgyas
163b6: bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pa dag/ bsam gtan dang po la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam
163b7: gtan gnyis pa la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang mnyam par gzhog cing / pha rol du phyin pa drug la yang spyod de/ de dag
163b8: bsam gtan thob pas/ lha tshe ring po'i nang du skyes shing / gal te mi'i nang du skye ba thob nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na yang / de dag dbang po rtul zhing dbang po mi rno ba yang yod do// shA ra dra ti'i
164a1: bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la yang spyod/ de dag thabs la mi mkhas pas/ bsam gtan
164a2: rnams spangs nas/ phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul ba yin te/ dbang po rno ba ma yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
164a3: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang
164a4: snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms
164a5: la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par
164a6: 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du gas med min bye mamed la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang
164a7: snyoms par 'jug/ dbang po lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug/ stobs lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang
164a8: snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje chen po la yang snyoms par 'jug ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi dbang gis mi skye/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gis mi skye/
164b1: gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa de dag de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ba yod do// de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
164b2: pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub du mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
164b3: gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams
164b4: pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par
164b5: 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la yod snyoms par 'jug cing //
164b6: de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye'o// de dag ni phyir 'dod khams 'dir skyes kyang / rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// bram
164b7: ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs pu skye'o/ / khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ste/ de yang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
164b8: bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug
165a1: byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang
165a2: snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du shes med mir skye mched la yang snyoms par// /
165a3: 'jug cing / de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang // ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// /
165a4: sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang skal ba
165a5: mnyam par skye'o/ / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do//
165a6: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas/ bsam
165a7: gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug
165a8: byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang
165b1: snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skyed mched la yang snyoms
165b2: par 'jug pa yod de/ de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skye'o// de dag de na yang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang chen po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems
165b3: can gyi nang na yang mchog dam pa phul du bya bar 'gyur te/ de dag de na 'khod cing gang ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing / chos
165b4: kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du rgyu zhing 'dod do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang chos kyi
165b5: 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba gdab pa byed do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dag/
165b6: thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la
165b7: yang snyoms par 'dug byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rjel yang rnams par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug// rnamama'
165b8: mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes meda'adra
166a1: shes med min skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yang yongs su sgom/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi yang yongs su sgom// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yang yongs su
166a2: sgom/ dbang po lnga yang yongs su sgom/ stobs lnga yang yongs su sgom/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yang yongs su sgom/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang yongs su sgom/ stong pa nyid dang
166a3: mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag gi dbang gis mi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur
166a4: cing / de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad de/ dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o// de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas nas/ dbang po ma nyams pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lha bye ba khrag
166a5: khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor
166a6: lo skor ba dag kyang yod do/ / // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcu gcig pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
166a7: chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs med pa'i khams su yang mi skye bar de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
166a8: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la rim gro dang bkur ba ste dang phu dud dang mchod pa byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
166b1: ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag/ mngon par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par
166b2: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa/
166b3: sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa de dag/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu med pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi
166b4: zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas
166b5: kyi sgra mi grag pa dang chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing / sangs rgyas kyi legs pa rjod/ chos kyi legs pa rjod/
166b6: dge 'dun gyi legs pa rjod pas/ sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar gyur te/ gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
166b7: pa de dag tu skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa
166b8: bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dab
167a1: po la dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
167a2: dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad dag kyang thob nas/ de dag nam yang 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs
167a3: med pa'i khams su yang mi skye zhing / de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag/ dang po
167a4: sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa 'thob pa yang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po semra
167a5: bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can grangs med tshad med pa'i don byas nas/ phur
167a6: po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag
167a7: kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de dag
167a8: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin
167b1: par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi
167b2: thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dag/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mas rnam par rtse zhing / 'di
167b3: lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// de dag bsam gtan dab de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/
167b4: bsam gtan gnyis pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/
167b5: bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gsum pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam
167b6: gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ / bsam gtan bzhi pa las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ nam mkha'
167b7: mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ / nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ladas
167b8: nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mdzad la snyoms par 'jug go// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa
168a1: snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par
168a2: gzhog go/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog
168a3: pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams
168a4: bsam gtan dang tshad med pa dang ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub
168a5: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi thob pa/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa/ dbang po lnga thob pa/ stobs lnga thob pa// byang chub kyi ya
168a6: lag bdun thob pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa/ bsam gtan rnams thob pa/ tshad med pa rnams thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
168a7: 'jug pa rnams thob pa/ rnam par thar pa brgyad thob pa// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa thob pa/ mngon par shes pa
168a8: rnams thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams thob pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs
168b1: ma byamam sa rnam pa pa brgyad papa bdag rnam par thar pa rgo gsum pa yang / kun du 'gas pa 'bras zab par ma thad/ lan cag kyarang 'ang ba'i 'bras bu zab par ma byed/ b+h+ya ma 'ad bar 'thas bu thob pas
168b2: mi byed dgra bcom pa nyid thab par mi byed/ da byang chubathob par mibyed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol su phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa
168b3: sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de/ sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
168b4: thob par 'gyur ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shAr dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par byed pa'i
168b5: shes gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa yin te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam
168b6: par spyod pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs
168b7: su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
168b8: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad med pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun
169a1: thob pa/ mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ba
169a2: brgyad thob pa dag/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi rtogs par mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
169a3: tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag/ 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams
169a4: su 'dong zhing / de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
169a5: chen po de dag ni bskal pa grangs med tshad med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la
169a6: rol du byin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par brtson te/ nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig mi smra// gnod pa dang ldan pa'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las mi byed pa dag
169a7: kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas/ sangs rgyas kyi ning nas sangs
169a8: rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi lam gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du byin pa
169b1: drug la gnas shing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams kyi bde ba'i yo byad thams cad nye bar sgrub cing / zas 'dod pa rnams la zas dang / skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang / bzhon
169b2: ba 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang / me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog dang / spos 'dod pa rnams la spos dang / phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba dang / drug pa 'dod pa rnams la thug pa dang / mal stan
169b3: 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / rgyun 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang / 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim gyis yongs su
169b4: sdud cing / 'tshe ba'i yo byad skyon med pa yongs su sgrub pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / tshul
169b5: khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
169b6: sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams khro ba med pa dang / gnod sems med pa la rab tu 'god pa byed pa dag kyang yod
169b7: ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du byin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos
169b8: thams cad la mngon par brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bsam gtan gyi
170a1: pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa las dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems
170a2: dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa lhur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/ sems
170a3: can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la/ ngan song thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos
170a4: ston pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul nas/
170a5: shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems
170a6: dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du
170a7: 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do//
170a8: lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub
170b1: sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags
170b2: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub phyogs kyi
170b3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
170b4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang
170b5: po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
170b6: gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
170b7: gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs
170b8: su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
171a1: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs
171a2: rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po
171a3: yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
171a4: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
171a5: gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su
171a6: sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang
171a7: gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi
171a8: zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs
171b1: su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing
171b2: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas
171b3: kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
171b4: mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas
171b5: kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i
171b6: dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs
171b7: rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// steng gi phyogs kyi
171b8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'
172a1: dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags
172a2: pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su sgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa
172a3: ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ mi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ dbang po gsal zhing yongs su dag
172a4: pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yongs su dag pa de dag gis/ skye bo mang po'i dga' ba dang mos pa skyed de/ de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying du sdug cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sems can de dag kyang
172a5: sems mos par gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar gyis theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
172a6: dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// ngag yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// yid yongs su dag pa la bslab
172a7: par bya'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin du gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin du gsal ba de
172a8: dag gis bdag mi bstod cing gzhan mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad// sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin/
172b1: pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dbul bar mi 'gyur zhing / log par 'gro ba dang ngan song du mi lhung ba dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
172b2: 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong ba dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i
172b3: bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ de dag dge ba
172b4: bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rab tu 'god pa dang sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pas sems can rnams yongs su sdud pa dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
172b5: dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la gnas shing / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongs su bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong du ma
172b6: la gnas shing / de dag la gnas nas/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang / mchod pa sna tshogs
172b7: kyis rim gro dang bkur bsti dang phu dud dang mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol du phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sems can log
172b8: par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos
173a1: snang bde dang nam yang 'bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi chos la yang dag par byung ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na/
173a2: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go mo dbye'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
173a3: dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ ngag gi las
173a4: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems
173a5: shing / 'di ni lus yin gyis des ni lus kyi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni yid yin gyis des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na/ de ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
173a6: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rtsom pa kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pas ni/
173a7: lus gang dang ngag gang dang yid gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa 'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ 'khrug
173a8: pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu'i lus mi dmigs so// ngag mi dmigs so// sems mi dmigs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
173b1: chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / ngag gi gnas ngan len skyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len skyed pa tsam du ni shes par mi bya ste/ de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na
173b2: shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su spyod do// ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong // yid kyi gnas
173b3: ngan len yongs su sbyong ste/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// ngag gi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o// yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba med pa'o//
173b4: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len spyod pa lags/ ngag gi gnas ngan len spyod pa lags/ yid kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba lags/
173b5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus mi dmigs/ ngag mi dmigs/ sems mi dmigs na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe byang chub sems
173b6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyod pa yin/ ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su spyod pa yin/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
173b7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems skyed pa
173b8: med par de rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar gzhog na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gan ngan len dang / ngag gi gnas ngani len
174a1: dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes ngas bshad do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong
174a2: zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha
174a3: rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags// bcom ldan
174a4: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus la dmigs pa med pa dang / ngag la dmigs pa med pa dang / yid la dmigs pa
174a5: med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin
174a6: pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / rang sangs
174a7: rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmigs pa med pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmigs pa med par gyur pa de ni/ shA ra dwa
174a8: ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la dmigs pa med cing blang ba med pa dang dor ba med pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
174b1: sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol du phyin pa drug la spyod cing / nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur
174b2: spyod pa'i rnams thub pa ma mchis pa lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la rlom
174b3: sems med pa dang / tshor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du shes la rlom sems med pa dang / 'du byed la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mig dang gzugs la
174b4: rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba dang sgra la rlom sems med pa dang / sna dang dri la rlom sems med pa dang / lce dang ro la rlom sems med pa dang / lus dang reg la rlom sems med pa dang / yid dang chos la
174b5: rlom sems med pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chu'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / me'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rlung gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / nam
174b6: mkha'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig gi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / mig
174b7: gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sgra'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med
174b8: pa dang / sna'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / dri'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / ro'i
175a1: khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / reg bya'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / lus kyi
175a2: rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / chos kyi khams la rlom sems med pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la rlom sems med pa
175a3: dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la rlom sems med pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol du
175a4: byin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom sems med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la rlom
175a5: sems med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa
175a6: dang / chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems med
175a7: pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang bzhin stong
175a8: pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med
175b1: pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
175b2: bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / dbang po lnga la rlom sems med pa dang / stobs lnga la
175b3: rlom sems med pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems med pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems
175b4: med pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / rnam par thar pa
175b5: brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sems med pa dang / stong pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la rlom sems
175b6: med pa dang / smon pa med pa la rlom sems med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems med pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la
175b7: rlom sems med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rlom sems med pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la rlom sems med pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la rlom
175b8: sems med pa dang / byams pa chen po la rlom sems med pa dang / snying rje chen po la rlom sems med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad la rlom sems med pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
176a1: la rlom sems med pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems med pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom sems
176a2: med pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems med pa dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems med pa dang / 'khor ba la rlom sems med pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la rlom sems med
176a3: par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol du phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol
176a4: du phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye/ mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan
176a5: pas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
176a6: 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mi dbul zhing phongs pa nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang mi dang
176a7: lha ma yin gyi nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
176a8: po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang
176b1: nyan to/ / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yo tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
176b2: klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon
176b3: tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
176b4: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing g.yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems
176b5: dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang
176b6: mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gas kan rnam par bya bdag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang shang
176b7: gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang spong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang
176b8: chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yan tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi 'am/
177a1: gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang /
177a2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi
177a3: bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhig
177a4: yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi//
177a5: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam
177a6: par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo / / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
177a7: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon na rnam par bye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang
177a8: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
177b1: sangs rgyas gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / / chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang
177b2: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ / chos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// dge 'dun gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi
177b3: skyed do/ / byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes mi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do// bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do// gzhan gyi 'du shes mi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do// ye shes de la
177b4: bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du byin pa mi dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ tshul khrims
177b5: kyi pha rol du byin pa mi dmigs so/ / bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ bzod pa'i pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi
177b6: dmigs so/ / bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa mi dmigs so// nang stong
177b7: pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// byi nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ byi nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa
177b8: nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ / chen po stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chen po stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus
178a1: byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//
178a2: thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang
178a3: bzhin stong pa nyid mi dmigs so/ / chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so//
178a4: mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ ngo bo nyid stong
178a5: pa nyid mi dmigs so/ / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi dmags
178a6: so/ / yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnams mi dmigs so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams mi dmigs so// dbang po lnga sgom ste/ dbang po rnams mi
178a7: dmigs so/ / stobs lnga sgom ste/ stobs rnams mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom ste/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pasgom ste/
178a8: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mi dmigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so// bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ bsam gtan rnams mi
178b1: dmigs so/ / tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ tshad med pa rnams mi dmigs so// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so//
178b2: rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams mi dmigs so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs so// stong pa
178b3: nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid mi dmigs so// mtshan ma med pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs so// smon pa med pa sgom ste/ smon pa med pa mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ mngon par
178b4: shes pa rnams mi dmigs so/ / ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnams mi dmigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom
178b5: ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams mi dmigs so// mi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom ste/ mi 'jigs pa rnams mi dmigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
178b6: mi dmigs so/ / byams pa chen po sgom ste/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs so// snying rje chen po sgom ste/ snying rje chen po mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad sgom ste/ sangs rgyas
178b7: kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwa brgyad mi dmigs so/ / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
178b8: 'bras bu mi dmigs so/ / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi dmigs so// dgra bcom pa nyid sgom ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid mi dmigs so// rang byang chub sgom ste/ rang byang chub mi
179a1: dmigs so/ / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid sgom ste/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mi dmigs so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu
179a2: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas
179a3: kyi chos thams cad kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo / / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang yongs su sbyong ba
179a4: yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang / chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas kyi mig go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs
179a5: su dag pa gang lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i dri byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
179a6: chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
179a7: dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bzhi pargya mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad lnga brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179a8: chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad drug brgya mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad bdun brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179b1: chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad brgyad brgya mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179b2: chen po sha'i mig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
179b3: chen po sha'i mig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis gling gsum mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i
179b4: mig gis gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
179b5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gnyis kyis 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
179b6: mthong ba yang yod do/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa
179b7: gang lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig
179b8: gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems
180a1: dpas rab tu shes so/ / 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems
180a2: dpas rab tu shes so/ / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs lha nye pan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas
180a3: rab tu shes so/ / tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu
180a4: shes so/ / snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung snang gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med
180a5: snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dge ba'i lha rnams/
180a6: kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung dge'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i
180a7: mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin
180a8: pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang
180b1: chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ / 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu
180b2: shes so/ / mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gya nom
180b3: snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
180b4: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lhanas
180b5: kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
180b6: kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed
180b7: kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mag de ni/ tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams
180b8: kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi
181a1: shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni//
181a2: chung snang gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
181a3: po'i lha'i mig de ni/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa'
181a4: sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ chung dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang
181a5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes
181a6: so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ chung che'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ tshad med che ba'i lha rnams
181a7: kyis mi shes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ mi che bI/
181a8: lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ mi gdung pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/
181b1: shin du mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de/
181b2: ni/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can rnams kyi
181b3: 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi/
181b4: 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang
181b5: skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab
181b6: tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho
181b7: dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can rnams
181b8: kyi 'tsho 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi
182a1: sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung
182a2: gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/
182a3: sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems
182a4: can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ / shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa
182a5: bam po bcu gnyis pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongasu dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
182a6: dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa
182a7: 'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am/ zag pa med pa'i chos gang yang mi shes pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas chos
182a8: gang yang ma mthong ba med/ ma thos pa med/ ma bsams pa med/ khong du ma chud pa med pa 'di ni/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/
182b1: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
182b2: chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
182b3: kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/ / dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas
182b4: 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang the tshom dang tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun du sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu
182b5: thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod
182b6: sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin du bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang /
182b7: nga rgyal dang rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro//
182b8: dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs
183a1: la lta ba dang / the tshom dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun du sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod
183a2: pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin du bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byedade
183a3: gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o/ / de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin du bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni
183a4: dgra bcom pa'o/ / gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma
183a5: zag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa'i kun du sbyor
183a6: ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu srabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir
183a7: 'ong ba'o/ / de la ma de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas//
183a8: gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang / nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems/
183b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci yang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gag pa'i chos can no
183b2: zhes bya bar shes pas dad pa la sogs pa dbang po lnga 'thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
183b3: sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po skyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
183b4: phyin pa la spyod do/ / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod do// de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang
183b5: lan te/ thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzin pa byed do// dge ba'i rtsa bas brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// bram ze che zhing
