260a6: 'das kyis bka' bul pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ len pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
260a7: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ srid pa byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
260a8: pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ srid pa ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
260b1: phul pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ srid pa la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
260b2: 'byor de ji snyam du sa pas/ byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral ba/ rab 'byor darnga rnam
260b3: du sems/ srid pa med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
260b4: sems/ skye ba byang chub sems dpa' yon snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye ba ma yin pa gzhan
260b5: zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye ba la byang chub sems dpa' yod
260b6: snyam 'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
260b7: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye ba med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
260b8: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
261a1: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
261a2: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
261a3: de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi
261a4: med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// / shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa// bam po bcu bdun pa/
261a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
261a6: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta
261a7: ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
261a8: lha ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'ad
261b1: de sas lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral ba/ rab 'byor da ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan/
261b2: 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
261b3: lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
261b4: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
261b5: lha ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
261b6: de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
261b7: de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
261b8: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
262a1: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom/
262a2: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
262a3: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snya ma 'am/ gsol
262a4: pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
262a5: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/
262a6: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/
262a7: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/
262a8: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin
262b1: snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems
262b2: dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
262b3: gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes
262b4: pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub
262b5: sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
262b6: rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
262b7: de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor derje
262b8: snyam du sems/ mig gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' bral ba/
263a1: rab 'byor du ji snyam du sems/ mig gang bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snya ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis pa
263a2: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
263a3: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig go de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta sa lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
263a4: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
263a5: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
263a6: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
263a7: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
263a8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta
263b1: ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
263b2: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la
263b3: ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
263b4: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
263b5: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
263b6: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
263b7: de drimam du sems/ 'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yig sum 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de la ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'abral pa/ rab 'byo
263b8: deri snyam du mams/ lce'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lagapa po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' phrul ba/ rab 'byung
264a1: du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
264a2: lce'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi de bzhin
264a3: nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig/
264a4: byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma phags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
264a5: yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/
264a6: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
264a7: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
264a8: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
264b1: lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'brer dang snyal dus mas/ yid kya bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yon mam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de sa sa lags so//
264b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das/
264b3: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
264b4: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
264b5: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyama'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
264b6: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan//
264b7: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
264b8: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
265a1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
265a2: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
265a3: pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
265a4: du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sgra'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skra'i
265a5: de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i de bzhin
265a6: nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri dide bzhin nyid ma yin pa
265a7: gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ngong snyam du sems/ dri'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
265a8: dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de'i snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam
265b1: 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/
265b2: gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
265b3: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa// bcom ldan
265b4: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags/
265b5: so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la ro de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
265b6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
265b7: pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg gi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
265b8: snyam du sems/ reg gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
266a1: snyam du sems/ reg gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
266a2: byang chub sems dpa' la reg gi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// reg gi de bzhin
266a3: nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid
266a4: byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig
266a5: byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
266a6: dpa' yod snya ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi de bzhin nyid
266a7: yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems
266a8: dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems
266b1: dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang
266b2: chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub
266b3: sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi
266b4: khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin
266b5: nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// gzugs
266b6: kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
266b7: gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
266b8: pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
267a1: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
267a2: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
267a3: de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol ba/
267a4: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems
267a5: dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
267a6: la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la mig gi/
267a7: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi
267a8: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
267b1: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'artso
267b2: de rje snyam du sems/ na pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
267b3: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
267b4: pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
267b5: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
267b6: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
267b7: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
267b8: pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ @
268a1: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor/
268a2: de ji snyam du sems/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
268a3: ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
268a4: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
268a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
268a6: lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol
268a7: pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems

268b1: yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub
268b2: sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems
268b3: dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
268b4: yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa'
268b5: yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin
268b6: snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub
268b7: sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub
268b8: sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la dri'i khams kyi
269a1: bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig
269a2: byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
269a3: kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i
269a4: rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab
269a5: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
269a6: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
269a7: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
269a8: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
269b1: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin
269b2: snya ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
269b3: yod snga ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i khams kyi de
269b4: bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i khams kyi
269b5: bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
269b6: ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
269b7: ror khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
269b8: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyama'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
270a1: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
270a2: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom

270a5: pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
270a6: yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la lce'i rnam par shes
270a7: pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i
270a8: khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
270b1: sems/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
270b2: rdzas kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor nga ji snya ma
270b3: du sems/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
270b4: sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
270b5: du sems/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
270b6: ji snyam du sems/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
270b7: dang snyam dus pa/ drug bya'i khams nyid bzhin nyid pa yin pa gzhan dag byung chub sems dpa' yin snyam pa/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das pa
270b8: phul pa/ rab 'byor dang snyam du sems/ deg bya'i 'am sa gyid bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyama'am/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ tha'argya
271a1: de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
271a2: reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi rnam par
271a3: shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi rnam
271a4: par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
271a5: ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
271a6: de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
271a7: de ji snyam du sems/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
271a8: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
271b1: du sems/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam
271b2: dus mas/ yod kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub semasas dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
271b3: byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi
271b4: khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
271b5: chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
271b6: pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
271b7: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin
271b8: nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
272a1: de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
272a2: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyama'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
272a3: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
272a4: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
272a5: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags/
272a6: so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
272a7: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
272a8: de lta ma lhags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
272b1: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
272b2: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
272b3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid mad stam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
272b4: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
272b5: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
272b6: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
272b7: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod sgyu ma'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni snyam
272b8: du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshwa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ chu'i
273a1: khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji ska
273a2: du sems/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mel
273a3: khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
273a4: sems/ me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems
273a5: byang chub sems dpa' la me'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ me'i khams
273a6: kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi de
273a7: bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma legs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
273a8: gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la
273b1: byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rlung gi
273b2: khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rlung gi khams kyis de bzhin nyid
273b3: med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa yin snyam 'am/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de
273b4: bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ / gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams kyi de
273b5: bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ nam
273b6: mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang
273b7: chub sems dpa' la nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
273b8: nam mkha'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
274a1: sems/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid byung chub sems dpa' yin snyama'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa
274a2: pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
274a3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod sgyu ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
274a4: so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
274a5: so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
274a6: de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yo/ snya ma 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
274a7: des/ ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
274a8: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
274b1: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' lam rig pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom
274b2: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ma rig pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom
274b3: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyama'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
274b4: de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
274b5: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snya ma du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
274b6: de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
274b7: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
274b8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
275a1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyama'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
275a2: 'das de lam lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsal pa/ bcom
275a3: ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan
275a4: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
275a5: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
275a6: lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de
275a7: lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// /
275a8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
275b1: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ming dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// /
275b2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan
275b3: 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
275b4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom
275b5: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
275b6: kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye mched drug gi de bzhin nyid med pa zhi go byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das
275b7: gyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji sum du sems/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
275b8: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab
276a1: 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ reg pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
276a2: de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la reg pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
276a3: reg pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'i de
276a4: bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig
276a5: byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa'
276a6: yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/
276a7: bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
276a8: 'das de lta ma lags so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yon snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so//
276b1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags
276b2: so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sred pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'dapa de lta ma lags so// bcom/
276b3: ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la sred pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis

276b7: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
276b8: de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la len pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
277a1: snyam du sems/ len pa'i de bzhin nyid med pazhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
277a2: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

277a5: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la srid pa'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
277a6: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ srid pa'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
277a7: bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
277a8: rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
277b1: stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ skye ba'i de bzhin nyid la byang chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
277b2: ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la skye ba'i de bzhin nyid yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/
277b3: skye ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi'i de
277b4: bzhin nyid byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa
277b5: gzhan zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid la byang
277b6: chub sems dpa' yod snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' la rga shi'i de bzhin
277b7: nyid yod snyas 'ag gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ rga shi'i de bzhin nyid med po nag byang chub sems dpa' yin pa
277b8: 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// // shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po bcwa brgyad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyis
278a1: dan gyi dbang gang zhig mthong na/ de skad du gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin// gzugs la yang byang chub
278a2: sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs yod pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba
278a3: ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang tshor ba yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba med pa yang byang chub sems
278a4: dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems/
278a5: dpa' la yang 'du shes yod pa ma yin/ 'du shes med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
278a6: 'du byed la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du byed yod pa ma yin/ 'du byed med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang
278a7: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang byang chub
278a8: sems dpa' ma yin/ mig kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'al
278b1: yang rig yod pa ma yin/ mig med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ nab ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba la yang byang chub sems
278b2: dpa' yod pa ma yin byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba yod pa ma yin/ rna ba med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems
278b3: dpa' ma yin/ sA la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sna yod pa ma yin/ sna med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
278b4: lce ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce yod pa ma yin/ lce med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
278b5: lus kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus yod pa ma
278b6: yin/ lus med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma
278b7: yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid yod pa ma yin/ yid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems
278b8: dpa' ma yin/ gzugs la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs yod pa ma yin/ gzugs med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra yang byang chub sems
279a1: dpa' ma yin/ sgra ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sA la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra yod pa ma yin/ sgra
279a2: med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yon/ dri yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub
279a3: sems dpa' la yang dri yod pa ma yin/ dri med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro la yang byang chub
279a4: sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro yod pa ma yin/ ro med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub
279a5: sems dpa' ma yin/ reg la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg yod pa ma yin/ reg med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyang byang chub sems
279a6: dpa' ma yin/ chos ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang chos yod pa ma yin/ chos med pa yang byang
279a7: chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa'
279b1: yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi khams yod pa ma yin/ mig gi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs/
279b2: kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs kyi khams yod pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi
279b3: khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
279b4: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang
279b5: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin//
279b6: byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i khams yod pa ma yin/ rna ba'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams/ kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams ma yin
279b7: pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra'i khams yod pa ma yin/ sgra'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems
279b8: dpa' ma yin/ na ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams
280a1: la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ na ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems
280a2: dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa'

280a7: khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i khams yod pa ma yin/ lce'i khams med
280a8: ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yon/ ro'o khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa'
280b1: yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro'i khams yod pa ma yin/ ro'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i
280b2: rnam par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i rnam par
280b3: shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang
280b4: chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi khams yod pa ma yin/ lus kyi khams med pa yang byang chub sems
280b5: dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg bya'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang
280b6: chub sems dpa' la yang reg bya'i khams yod pa ma yin/ reg bya'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam
280b7: par shes pa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi rnam par
280b8: shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams ma yin pa
281a1: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid kyi khams yod pa ma yin/ yid kyi
281a2: khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams la yang byang chub sems

281a5: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sa'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sa'i khams ma yin pa gzhan
281a6: yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sa'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ sa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
281a7: chu'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chu'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chu'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang chu'i
281a8: khams yod pa ma yin/ chu'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ me'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ me'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ me'i khams la
281b1: yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang me'i khams yod pa ma yin/ me'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rlung gi khams kyang byang chub sems dpa'

281b3: rlung gi khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
281b4: nam mkha'i khams la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang nam mkha'i khams yod pa ma yin/ nam mkha'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i

281b6: la yang rnam par shes pa'i khams yod pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i khams med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ma rig pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
281b7: ma yin/ ma rig pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang ma rig pa yod pa ma yin/ ma rig pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma
281b8: yin/ 'du byed ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang 'du byed yod pa ma yin/ 'du byed med pa yang byang chub
282a1: sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa la yang byang chub
282a2: sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ rnam par shes pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ming dang gzugs kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
282a3: ming dang gzugs ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ming dang gzugs la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang ming dang gzugs yod pa ma yin/ ming dang

282a7: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang tshor ba yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba
282a8: med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sred pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sred pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sred pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin byang chub sems
282b1: dpa' la yang sred pa yod pa ma yin/ sred pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ len pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ len pa ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ len pa la yang
282b2: byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang len pa yod pa ma yin/ len pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ srid pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ srid pa ma yin pa
282b3: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ srid pa la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang srid pa yod pa ma yin/ srid pa med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye
282b4: ba yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye ba ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ skye ba la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang skye ba yod pa ma yin/
282b5: skye ba med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' mo yin/ rga shi yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rga shi ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rga shi la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin
282b6: byang chub sems dpa' la yang rga shi yod pa ma yin/ rga shi med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan
282b7: yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid
282b8: med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid la
283a1: yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes kyi
283a2: de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang
283a3: chub sems dpa' la yang 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin

283a5: kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma

283a7: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems
283a8: dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ mig gi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//

283b2: de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang

283b4: yin/ lce'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lce'i
283b5: de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid la
283b6: yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems
283b7: dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa
283b8: ma yin/ yid kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
284a1: gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub
284a2: sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/
284a3: byang chub sems dpa' la yang sgra'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sgra'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan
284a4: yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang dri'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ dri'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems
284a5: dpa' ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/
284a6: byang chub sems dpa' la yang ro'i de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ ro'i de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid
284a7: ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ reg gi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg gi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ reg
284a8: gi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin//
284b1: chos kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang chos kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ chos kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi
284b2: khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa'
284b3: yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ mig gi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang
284b4: chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
284b5: dpa' la yang gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems
284b6: dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma
284b7: yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i
284b8: khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa
285a1: ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ rna ba'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
285a2: kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
285a3: dpa' la yang sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sgra'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma
285a4: yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang
285a5: chub sems dpa' la yang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
285a6: kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems
285a7: dpa' la yang sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ sna'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin
285a8: nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang dri'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ dri'i khams
285b1: kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang
285b2: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa

285b4: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lce'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
285b5: med la yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin
285b6: nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang re'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ ro'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par
285b7: shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de
285b8: bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang
286a1: byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus
286a2: kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lus kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems

286a4: chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ reg bya'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes
286a5: pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
286a6: de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi de bzhin nyid
286a7: med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ yid kyi khams
286a8: kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems dpa' yod pa ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' la yang yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin/ yid kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid med pa yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/
286b1: chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid ma yin pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ma yin/ chos kyi khams kyi de bzhin nyid la yang byang chub sems
